event.description:
** Ten Grand Prix Points! **

Saturday - Sunday,  March 5 - 6,

 (or  Sunday, March 6),  2011:

New York March

Open and Under 2000

Chess Tournament!

     4-Rounds, Swiss-System Chess Tournament, 30 Moves/90 Minutes, Then Sudden Death/1 Hour (30/90, SD/60). Two separate sections.

 

1. Open Section, open to all.   FIDE-Rated.

Prizes: 1st - $400,   2nd - $200,   3rd - $100,

Top-Scoring Player Rated Under 2200 (or Unrated) - $100

 

 

2. Under 2000 Section, open to players rated Under 2000, or Unrated players.

Prizes: 1st - $200,   2nd - $100,

($100 prize limit to Unrated players)

Top-Scoring Player Rated Under 1800 - $100

 

     All prizes proportioned on 60 total paid entries, except a minimum of half each prize is GUARANTEED! Unrateds may enter either section, EXCEPT non-U.S. unrateds must enter Open Section.

      Current USCF membership is required of ALL PLAYERS.  The March 2011 Official USCF Rating List  will be used for this event.  CCA minimum ratings  may also be used at the Director's discretion.

 

     Entry Fee: $45, Marshall Club Members $30-- ENTRY FEES $2 LESS for players registering online no later than the Thursday before the tournament! $2 ADVANCE ENTRY FEE DISCOUNT APPLIES ONLY FOR PLAYERS REGISTERING ONLINE! NO OTHER ADVANCE ENTRY DISCOUNTS ARE AVAILABLE!

***  $10 EXTRA to “enter” by phone! ***   

May be limited to the 1st 62 players to pay the entry fee!

 

Your choice of two separate playing options:

    1. Two-Day Schedule,

       Round times:

      12:30 and 5:30 pm both days;

 

 

     2. One-Day Schedule,

       Round times:

      Sunday at 10 am, 11:15 am, 12:30 pm and 5:30 pm  (rounds 1-2 of the 1-Day Schedule only are Game/30; both schedules merge for Round 3 at 12:30 pm on Sunday).

 

      Players who register in advance should be at the Marshall Chess Club when their first game begins. Players who do not register in advance must register at site, at least 15 minutes before their first game. On-site registration IS ONLY ON THE DAY OF THE TOURNAMENT, AFTER 11:30 AM. Limit of two half-point byes available if committed to before Round 2. Re-entry: $20.

    Current membership in the U.S. Chess Federation is required of all participants (in any USCF-rated tournament).  USCF membership dues may be paid when registering for the tournament, by adding the cost of a USCF membership to your entry order, on the first page.  USCF Membership dues are not refundable.

       Entry fees less $3 service charge refunded to players who notify the Tournament Director that they will withdraw from the tournament NO LATER THAN THE THURSDAY BEFORE THE TOURNAMENT. $5 service charge for each player refund requested on the Friday before the tournament-- BEFORE 8 pm. NO EMAIL RECEIVED AFTER 8 PM ON THE FRIDAY BEFORE THE TOURNAMENT.

     $5 service charge for each player refund requested by phone on the day of the tournament-- AT LEAST 15 MINUTES BEFORE GAME BEGINS. ** NO REFUNDS ALLOWED AFTER 15 MINUTES BEFORE GAME BEGINS. NO REFUNDS TO PLAYERS WHO FORFEIT WITHOUT PROPER ADVANCE NOTICE (NO-SHOWS)! **

     NO MAIL ENTRIES! Questions,  email: chesscentr@aol.com (no email received after 8 pm the Friday before the tournament), or call: 845-569-9969 or 212-477-3716.

   *** NO ONLINE ENTRIES AFTER THE THURSDAY BEFORE THE TOURNAMENT! *** Players who register online no later than the Thursday before the tournament should print out their registration confirmation AND BRING IT WITH THEM TO THE TOURNAMENT. THIS WILL BE YOUR ONLY ENTRY CONFIRMATION!

     WE DO NOT "CONFIRM" ENTRY CONFIRMATIONS-- by phone, mail or email! If you did NOT receive a confirmation of your online registration, that means your online payment was not sucessfully received, and you are  NOT registered for the tournament.

event.description:
New, discounted rates! As of November 2009, current CMUG members get into CMUG events for FREE! Non-member rate has dropped to $10 per event.

The group will discuss aspects of color management, proofing and digital workflows for content creators (designers, advertisers, photographers, production in-plants, etc.), prepress and printers. There will be discussions, workshops, and demonstrations of products and techniques by experts and vendors to showcase the latest technologies available to the membership. A portion of most meetings will be devoted for an open exchange of ideas and question and answer time.

Click here to view current CMUG events in Portland
http://www.eventspdx.pnwcmug.com


 
Feel free to contact us with any questions at colorcontrolfreak @ pnwcmug.com

event.description:
2011 CMS Expo - May 2, 3, 4, 2011

Hilton Orrington Hotel - Evanston, IL

Hosted by the CMS Association  |  http://CMSExpo.net


. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 


Web designers and business leaders are invited to attend the 5th annual 2011 CMS Expo. CMS Expo is the place for content pros to hone their skills in business and technology, while making new business connections, all under one roof.  

The 2011 CMS Expo will be held May 2nd through 4th at the Hilton Orrington Hotel, a block from Northwestern University, in Evanston, Illinois. CMS Expo is an international business-tech conference. Over 400 are expected to participate.

The conference will feature over ninety learning sessions, keynotes, lively interactive panels, business exhibits, the annual CMSA Spotlight Awards, plus business networking socials and unconference-style roundtable discussions.  

Who Should Attend:

  • Business Leaders & Decision-Makers
  • Website Designers & Developers
  • Mobile App Developers
  • Tech Consultancies


Industries Represented:

  • Small Business
  • Mid-Tier “Fast Companies”
  • Enterprise Organizations
  • Non-Profit Organizations
  • Government & Education


Learning Tracks:

  • Web Business Track
    3 full days of learning from the world’s top business minds, including sessions on web marketing, mobile commerce, content strategy and more

  • Tech Foundations
    Covering what’s hot: HTML5, CSS3, JQuery, Titanium and more

  • Creative Foundations
    Design, writing, audio, video & more

  • Comparison Track
    Compare many of the world’s top CMSes, apps & add-ons

  • Evaluation Track
    Learn and demo new products and services for the web world

  • DotNetNuke CMS
    The #1 .Net CMS, with over 10,000 apps and add-ons

  • Drupal CMS
    Powering Whitehouse.gov and many major sites worldwide

  • Joomla! CMS
    The most popular CMS on the planet

  • Umbraco CMS
    One of the fastest-growing .Net-powered CMSes today!


Full Registration Includes:

  • Access to All CMS Learning Sessions and Exhibitors
  • Delicious Hot Meals - Breakfast, Lunch, Snacks, Ice Cream
  • CMS Comparison & Evaluation Sessions
  • CMS KickStart Basic Training For New CMS Users
  • CMS Future Roadmap Sessions For Advanced CMS Users
  • Socials & Business Networking Events Every Day (and night)
  • CMSA Spotlight Awards Celebration
  • 24 x 7 Access to the CMSX Remote Office (work from the road)
  • Entry to the The Gotta Have It Gadget Giveaway
  • Goodie Bag, Full of Great Swag
  • Endless Coffee – All day, all night.  ;)


Price:  $279 / day   or   $779 / full registration



. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 


2011 CMS Expo Sponsors:


. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 




Want to sponsor CMS Expo?  http://cmsx.info


. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 



 

See you in beautiful Evanston, Illinois!

 

For More Information:

CMS Expo Website: http://cmsexpo.net
CMS Association Phone: (815) 455-2900
Follow us on Twitter @CMSExpo  #CMSX

Download a printable overview here (.pdf)

event.description:
The 2011 Musician, Artist & Gamer Festival is a 3day event that fuses Hip Hop, Rock, Pop, R&B, and Alternative music, with the exciting world of video games and art. This years event will feature live band performances, video game tournaments, giveaways, celebrity forums, talent competitions, a comic book convention and much, much more....

The convention will be held August 12th-14th in and around the Los Angeles area and is open to anyone planning on attending. This event will take place at various locations around the city and special event ticket holders will be granted access to private concerts and performances as well as access to other events.  

**Tickets and special event badges will be mailed out beginning August1st and are non-refundable**

 

Facebook

Twitter

event.description:
• No more diet struggles
  • Stop losing energy
  • Reduce your stress load

ACHIEVING VIBRANT HEALTH - HALF DAY WORKSHOP
DISCOVER THE SECRETS TO EATING SMARTER

 

If you are like most people you are only getting HALF OF THE ESSENTIAL NUTRIENTS you need from food on a daily basis.

 

You can easily spend thousands of $$$ on diets, supplements and prescription drugs and never really know what it's like to truly feel healthy. How do you discover the tools, secrets and knowledge on how to easily reduce stress, increase energy and feel great? 

 

ACHIEVING VIBRANT HEALTH IS YOUR ANSWER TO DISCOVERING A HEALTHIER YOU!

 

During this half day event Adam reveals the simple things you can do to achieve;

 

  • NO MORE STRUGGLING WITH DIETS & WEIGHT
  • STOP RUNNING OUT OF ENERGY, TIME & PATIENCE
  • REDUCE THE IMPACT OF STRESS ON YOUR LIFE

 

Here's what others are saying about their experience

"You are one of the best & more engaging speakers I have heard in a very long time." ~ Yasmine Klein

 

"The knowledge you shared with us helped me realized that the foods that I thought were healthy for me are actually stunting any progress with my health.  I only attended your seminar 2 days ago but since you’ve opened my eyes, I’ve implemented better food choices and already I feel lighter, more energetic, and healthier and general.  Thank you so much for sharing your story and being a light to those of us in the dark.  Your passion is inspirational." ~

Tammie Lafreniere

 

"I really appreciated your presentation yesterday and look forward to attending the upcoming Achieving Vibrant Health workshop. I learned so much yesterday in one-half hour, that was so valuable, that I know the whole day event will be empowering. Thanks again, you were entertaining and educational ~ all in a sweep! ~ R. Stuiver City of Richmond

 

SEATING IS LIMITED for the next ACHIEVING VIBRANT HEALTH on

 

SATURDAY
MARCH 14, 2009
MARRIOTT HOTEL
DOWNTOWN VANCOUVER
9AM-5PM

 

DON'T MISS THIS OPPORTUNITY TO SEE ADAM LIVE

ORDER YOUR TICKETS TODAY


www.poweroffood.com

event.description:
The TCE Career, Life & Business Conference will deliver vetted, authentic  21st century intelligence/technology that WILL increase your purpose, positioning and profit potential.  Our TCE Conference attendees

will harness critical connections /conversations BEFORE and AFTER this event with a "no excuse" platform towards making Monday mornings...AWESOME.   Yes, this event will be different!  You will sense it in the TCE atmosphere as you experience..."a global enterprise with a boutique "just for me" feel.  This TCE conference was created with YOU in mind!    Don't hesitate, NO MORE excuses...you ARE worth the investment!   Make a week-end of it, bring your family... and enjoy the Virginia Beach waterfront, sand & waves with our TCE Conference VIP Hotel Rates , contact the  VirginiaBeachResort   and get your suite today!  Use Discount Code:  Pushup & Save 20% on the Conference.

 

 

Meet Our Virtual Sponsors & Partners

 

          

 

               

 

Tickets $79 & $129 (Code Pushup & save $$$, Limited Time)

Vendor Opportunities range from $160 - $325

Conference Sponsorships range from $500 - $3000

    

The Career Engineer (TCE) is Featured in...

 

                 

        


 

 

Why Should YOU Attend This Conference? 

 

  • Meet Dr. Letitia Wright,  "Oprah of California", Movie Producer, International Celebrity &  TV Host, Author, Speaker &  Media guru, 
  • Connect REAL  professionals from VA, NC, GA, DC, MD, NY,  CA
  • Connect with CEO's, VPs, nationally recognized experts who are waiting to meet YOU
  • Access to VIP REAlationship networking hosted by America's Career Engineer
  • REAL strategies for BOOSTING YOUR competitive edge in the 21st century Green/Technology, Career/Workforce,  Business/Contracting...& more
  • $79 & $129 Ticket includes:  Friday networking, awards luncheon, vendor showcase, ALL panels, connecting with ALL presenters.
  • (Want Biz?) TCE Conference Sponsor & TCE Corporate Sponsorships

 

 

TCE Career, Life & Business Conference Speakers

 

Our Mistress of Ceremony: Ms. Cheryl Tan, co-host of The Hampton Roads Show, Fox43 & Wavy10 TV reporter and media personality!  Click and meet Cheryl today.

 

 


 Lunch Keynote Speaker & Green Panel Moderator:  Dr. Letitia Wright , Keynote Speaker for our Luncheon and Awards presentation.  Voted No. 33 on the 50 Most Influential Woman in Social Media, this media magnet is someone YOU need to connect with.   Dr. Wright is a celebrity TV host, international speaker, author, media/pr pioneer & coined "the Oprah of California.  Her show the Wright Place TV hits 5.2 million homes per week in the California and Atlanta markets.  In additional to her media savvy and consulting intel, Dr. Wright has produced her first movie which will debut December 9th 2010.   Visit Dr. Wright at WrightPlaceTV .   Dr. Wright is a TCE Network Member (California)  and we are proud and honored to have this amazing woman in our community of professionals. 

 

Raymond Willis, CEO of Heritage Funding:  Just Confirmed for our "Meet 21st Century CEO Panel", Mr. Raymond Willis, Jr. CEO of Heritage Funding.   During one of the worse financial times in our nations history, Raymond Willis transformed his mortgage company into a financing empire delivering "financial underwriting" to residential, commercial markets in all 50 states.  In addition to that, he is now financing the entertainment industry with funding for movie and TV projects. Raymond is CONNECTED and recognized as a Power Broker in his circles of influence..and that included the White House. HeritageFunding

 

Tracy Keller, CEO of Girl Scouts Colonial Coast:  Just confirmed for our "Meet 21st Century CEO" Panel, Since 1997 Tracy has lead this chapter of the National Girl Scout Association into the 21st century with strategic innovations, economic foresite, futurist vision and accolades to boot.  Yes, today's GirlScouts in more than just "Cookies & Camping".  Talk about the Power of Girls! Visit her website Gsccc.org   

 

Rosetta Rolan, Assistant Director of Career Services at DeVry University:  Confirmed for our "What Does it Take to Get HIRED...Today" Workforce Panel. Rosetta will share 21st century careers and what employers and institutions of higher learning are DOING to ensue we are competitive in this economy..   In addition her duties at DeVry Rosetta brings years of experience in diversity recruiting, media/public relations branding and a host of other talking points that will amaze YOU at this conference.  DeVry University

 

TCE Green/STEM Technology Panelist .  Dr. Sandra DeLoatch is the Dean of the School of Science and Technology at Norfolk State University and former Chair to the Computer Science Department. She received her Ph.D. from Indiana University, her M.S. from the College of William and Mary, her M.A. from the University of Michigan, and her B.S. from Howard University. She is a member of the Board of Zoning Appeals for the City of Suffolk and a member and past treasurer for Alpha Kappa Sorority, Inc in Virginia Beach.  Meet NSU's CSET program today.

 

TCE Business Panelist:  CEO Odessa Hopkins Washington, DC Area Business woman, Another Approach Enterprises is confirmed for our TCE Business Panel.  Odessa has over 20 years of federal contracting intelligence and "keeps it REAL" when she shares the "how- to's" of government contracting.  Yes, she has contracting opportunities and contacts for business owners who are vetted, squared away and ready to roll.  Get to know Odessa right now on her national website AnotherApproachEnterprises and at the TCE Career, Life & Business Conference.

 

TCE Green Energy/Technolgy Panelist:  Tonnie G. Harrison, Certified Energy Manager (CEM) (PEM) is a 2009 Presidential Awardee for Leadership in Federal Energy Management by President Barack Obama.  Tonnie's energy consulting expertise and program management collaborations helped a U.S. Navy base reduce it's energy costs by over $30Million dollars.  Learn about GREEN jobs/GREEN Business from someone who is employed and does business in that industry.  In additional to his Energy Manager duties, Tonnie is the Chief instructor for the "new" Military Blue to Energy Green' Energy Career Transition program.  Learn more about this new initiative right here.  Click Military Blue to Energy Green .


TCE Career/Workforce Panelist:  Ms. Vaughnchette Townsel, Branch Manager of Manpower is  Confirmed for the "What Does It Take to Get Hired...Today,"  Workforce Panel.  Vaughnchette is a TCE Network Member with over 13 years in the Staffing/Recruiting industry helping the "right" employee to get hired by the "right" employer.  Want to know what employers are looking for and what they don't want!  Find out at the TCE Career, Life & Business conference.  Meet & connect with Manpower Virginia Beach today.   


TCE Career/Workforce Panelist:  Yvette Young, Vice President of Operations for the Urban League of Hampton Roads  is confirmed for our "What Does It Take to Get HIRED ...Today" workforce panel.  The Urban League of Hampton Roads, provide Education, Employment, Housing and Empowerment for all citizens  in the Hampton Roads region.   This Urban League chapter has helped to save over 400 homes from foreclosure.  In order to provide this level of nationally recognized services, it takes a seasoned manager who knows how to find "the right talent".  Yvette will share, what she looks for in candidates and "surprising insights" on what gets people hired.  Visit Urban League of Hampton Roads today.

 

TCE Conference Rates $169 (plus taxes&fees) per day ($250 Value)

( All rooms are Suites, with Balcony's and water views!!!

 Virtual Tour Virginia Beach Resort Hotel & Conference Center

organizer.description: Voted 2010 2009, 2008, and 2007 “The Best Job Placement & Training Site on the Internet,” 2010 Women in Business Achievement Award Honoree & recipient of the 2009 Business Innovation Award, "The Career Engineer (TCE) www.TceNow.com offers career, business and "how to" e-business/social media consulting services.. The Career Engineer's Network provides employment/business connections, job posting services and procurement opportunities. Additionally, we offer national TCE career/business memberships and "How NOT to Get Hustled" business coaching, TCE partners with business owners and employers with marketing opportunities via TCE's website, radio, television and event sponsorships. The Career Engineer's non-traditional and “soul” stirring delivery of career and business performance/motivation has landed the award winning consultant a nomination as one of the "Top 50 Tweeples to Follow" on Twitter. The motivator has been featured on the nationally syndicated Tavis Smiley Radio Show, Fox 43 TV - The Career/Biz Expert, ABC affiliates, CNN, Entrepreneur Magazine’s Women in Business Radio Show, Wall Street Journal, and The Chicago Tribune –just to name a few in a long list of various public venues and national media outlets. Mrs. Francina R. Harrison, MSW, “The Career Engineer”, graduated Summa Cum Laude with a Bachelor in Social Work and received her Masters in Social Work (MSW) from Norfolk State University. The motivator brings more than of 14 years of industry “know-how”, service and success in transforming the “average” presenter into an “awesome” performer. Stay tuned for the Career Engineers Internet Television Show & our TCE West Coast Explosion!
organizer.name: TheCareerEngineers .com

Is Finally Here!!!

for Quinceañeras and Sweet 16 to be

organizer.description: We, the team at Quinceaneras Magazine, are proud to present to all of our beautiful quinceanera to be girls, a magazine tailored to their needs. We, at Quinceaneras Magazine believe in the fantasy created around a quinceanera celebration, for us is the most important event in a woman’s life, because a quinceanera happens once in a lifetime, a quinceanera is a unique event for the quinceanera girl and her family. We, at Quinceaneras Magazine believe in progress, We, at Quinceaneras Magazine believe in hard work, and these statements had brought us to where we are now, as leaders in the Quinceaneras y Novias industry in the United States of America. Quinceaneras Magazine is growing on every Quinceaneras edition, you can find us from California to Texas, and Quinceaneras Magazine is expanding quickly to the East Coast. From Quinceanera dresses, Quinceanera photography, quinceanera planning, quinceanera flowers, quinceanera reception, quinceanera invitations, quinceanera video, quinceanera gowns, quinceanera tiara, quinceanera accessories and an endless list of products and services, we are the complete local guide that leads to customize the perfect quinceanera celebration. Quince Años is our inspiration to create a magazine like this, and a website that works for every quinceanera looking to create the perfect quince event. Thank you. The team at Quinceaneras Magazine
organizer.name: Quinceañera Magazine

ticket.name: San Antonio Expo March 06 , 2011 New Location Henry B. Gonzalez Convention Center

event.title: San Antonio Quinceañera Expo March 06 , 2011 New Location Henry B. Gonzalez Convention Center

event.description:
Ohio Health & Wealth Expo is a one day Health & Wealth event for the entire family.

 We are bringing together local and national health, Wealth, beauty and fitness product & service providers, including major companies, hospitals, physicians, dentists, natural and alternative practitioners, chiropractors, health food retailers, & community non-profit organizations.

 A showcase of information about products and services including:

Free medical testing, meet local doctors, meet Ohio dentists, exam local hospitals, learn about the latest health products and health food retailers, Beauty, sample nutritional foods and products, fitness demonstrations, healthy cooking lessons Business Opportunities, franchises, banks, financial experts and more... 

Business Training includes:

How to build home based business, How to prosper in network marketing, how to make money online, Health training by medical professionals,  Product training for Ardyss International,  some of the Featured speakers include Doctors, Financial experts and more to be announced!

All under one roof for one day!

 

 Speakers 

Dr. Nick Yphantides author of  My Big Fat Greek Diet. And How to lose weight and never find it again.  He lost a total of 270 pounds. He loaded his  RV van and began a pilgrimage that covered 38,000 miles across the length and width of the great United States! while attending 110 Major League Baseball games, including the 2001 All-Star Game, League Championship Series, and the amazing 2001 World Series between the Diamondbacks and the Yankees while dropping the weight..

His desire is for you to be encouraged and motivated in your own personal health and fitness.  “This adventure has been such an overwhelming gift from God.  The least I can do is share some of the pearls of experience and lessons learned with others who have the interest.”  

 

As seen on: 

Health & Wellness

                

 Dr Lee Laney                                Dr Marisha Agana                Dr Tonia Farmer               Sharon Hudson

Holistic Gastroenterology           Pediatritian                            ENT Surgeon                     Expert Biller & coder

AustinTown Ohio                           Cortland, Ohio                      Warren, Ohio

 

Dr Cecil Forbes

Former Associate Chiropractor

Detroit Lions NFL

 

Dr Jorge Gonzalez, Neurologist, Tulsa OK

Dr Marcia Harris, GYN, New York

 

Seminars include:

Maternity & Pregnancy Health, Children’s health, Women’s Health, Back Health, Ear Nose & Throat, Digestive Health

Inventors Panel, Weight lost, Antioxidants, Preventative Medicine, Wealth training, Home Based business,  Alternative medicines, Fundraising and more..

 

 

Wealth Corner

 

Jewel teaches you How to raise funds for your non-profit.

Jewel Tankard is a multi-millionaire entrepreneur, first lady of Destiny Christian Center wife of Stella Award winning Gospel Musician Ben Tankard. She is also a Platinum president with Ardyss International. Jewel has given over $150,000 to her church, raised money for her church, and helped her members to prosper. This is a” must” for pastors and non-profit organizations.

 

Jewel Tankard,                                                            

 

How to make it Big in Network Marketing

Bryant and Neesy Huff found themselves financially devastated and on the brink of  bankruptcy until they started a Home Based business and found themselves going from broke to over 6 figures in a few months.   

Bryant Huff & Neesy Huff,

 

 

www.OhioHealthyWealthyExpo.com

 

and more...

 Inventors Panel

 

 Inventor, QVC Expert to the stars

 Kim Babjack Is The Home Shopping Network Agent To The Stars. She is the exclusive agent for all of Donald Trump and Robert Kiyosaki's dealings on home shopping channels like QVC & HSN.

Kim has made millions on QVC with her products. Her zip-a-ruffle has sold for over 10 years on QVC!Her expertise has been recognized on national television shows like NBC TODAY Show, The Big Idea with Donny Deutsch, and she has been written about in the Wall Street Journal and Entrepreneurs Magazine.  

 

 

 

 Inventor, Author QUANTUM HEALING,

Together with Dr. Bob Moog, they invented the first music synthesizers.  He is personally responsible for presenting the Mini Moog, and he pioneered the performance music synthesizer industry and market worldwide. His new invention

His new invention eliminates the toxic frequencies and the harmful substances they produce in your body!  

 David Van Koevering

How to monetize your ideas and inventions, Inventors Panel

Her first invention went from idea to a licensing deal with a major manufacturer in 5 months. She teaches you how to build monetize with your ideas on a budget. Her “Adjustable Hat Rack is now featured in stores including Walmart.com.  

 

                                                                  Kim Laney

Northeast Ohio Health & Wealth Expo

serving Cleveland, Warren, Akron, Youngstown  & Pennsylviana

Eastwood Expo Center, Warren Ohio

Saturday, March 26, 2011

10:00 am- 6:00 pm

and more...

organizer.description: The Doctors of Doctors Showcase, Ardyss International and its affiliate partners are Committed to impacting our world with resources, products and information that will allow every member of our family, community and our world to HAPPY, HEALTHY and WEALTHY.The wonderful Doctors Showcase wants to empower you with knowledge that will allow you to lead a healthier lifestyle and more proserous life. Many of the doctors will be offering free screening at the event.
organizer.name: Doctors Showcase

ticket.name: Ohio Health & Wealth Expo Advance Event Tickets

ticket.description: 50 tickets minimum for Group rate discount of $3.50 per ticket. Bring your entire team to this Health & Wealth Expo. Bring guests, friend and family. You can re-sell the tickets to your team or give them away to your guest, team and family. This will be an event that you will not want to miss. This is the event that will educate and grow your organization.
ticket.name: Group Rates (Advance Ticket Discount)

event.description:
San Antonio Bridal Expo is a one-stop shopping experience where you 

can walk along aisles and aisles of the area's best wedding products and services

in one convenient location. Participating vendors create lavish exhibit displays

showcasing their products so that you can easily see everything they have to offer

for your wedding.

If you are interested in modeling bride dresses please fill out this form.

Interested in becoming an exhibitor for the expo?

Fill out this form and a kit about the expo will be sent to you by e-mail.

You can find this types of vendors:

Beauty    

Disc Jockeys    

Limousines & Carriages

Bridal Accessories    

Favors    

Party Rental

Bridal Salon    

Florists    

Photographers

Ceremony Music    

Gifts For The Bridal Party    

Publications / Media

Ceremony Officiants    

Guest Accommodations    

Reception Locations

Ceremony Sites    

Hotels    

Reception Music

China, Silver & Crystal    

Invitations    

Tuxedos

Decorations    

Jewelry

Videographers


Is Finally Here!!!
Bringing you the Best:

for Bridal to be


• 100+ Vendors to Make that Special day Magical!!!

• 2 Fashion Shows displaying the

"Bridal look" for 2011

• Vals Demos

• Live Performances

Come Join our  Expo

210-781-6377


Admission is $10 dlls (children under 8 free)

PreSale $7.00
